name: Slime Escape!
description:
Escape The Institution by Running Sliding and Jumping out of Danger, All using the SpaceBar! 

Hold space to Run

Let go of space to Slide

Tap space to Jump

I'm not happy with where this game is right now, but I decided to submit what I had to this Jam anyway! I really put myself out of my comfort zone, and had a blast developing. ENJOY!

Thank you Janachur#4657 for creative input.

Thank you Paul E. Messier#1557 for the music.

Thank you IanTheBee#6969 for the sound effects.
